name.baseName: municipal wastewater treatment ; sludge ; Vacuum drying
市政污水处理; 污泥 ;真空干燥

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Sludge vacuum drying is a sludge treatment technology that utilizes low-temperature drying in a vacuum environment to evaporate water from sludge, thereby reducing its moisture content. This technology dries sludge by placing it in a vacuum chamber that reduces the pressure and temperature so that the water is evaporated with low energy consumption. Vacuum drying of sludge efficiently reduces the moisture content of the sludge to an acceptable range, reducing the volume and weight of the sludge for subsequent treatment or disposal.
污泥真空干燥是一种污泥处理技术，利用真空环境下的低温干燥将污泥中的水分蒸发，从而降低其含水量。这种技术通过将污泥置于真空室中，降低压力和温度，使水分以较低的能量消耗被蒸发出来，从而实现污泥的干燥。污泥真空干燥能够高效地将污泥中的水分含量降低至可接受范围，减少了污泥的体积和重量，便于后续处理或处置。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The vacuum drying process starts with placing the wetted material in a sealed container, and then reduces the pressure inside the container through an evacuation operation so that the moisture evaporates at a lower temperature. Subsequently, the evaporated moisture is discharged out of the container through a depressurization system to finally dry the material.
真空干燥过程首先将湿润的物料放置在密封容器中，然后通过抽空操作降低容器内的压力，使水分以较低的温度蒸发。随后，通过减压系统将蒸发的水分排出容器外，最终实现物料的干燥。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The vacuum drying process of sludge from municipal wastewater treatment is typically applied in the management and reduction of waste volumes produced by municipal wastewater treatment facilities. It is utilized to decrease the moisture content of sludge, transforming it into a more stable form suitable for further processing, transportation, and disposal or utilization, such as in agricultural applications as a soil amendment or produced into biofuel.
市政污水处理过程中产生的污泥真空干燥通常应用于市政污水处理设施产生的废物体积管理和减少。它用于降低污泥的水分含量，将其转化为更稳定的形式，便于进一步处理、运输和处置或利用，如在农业应用中作为土壤改良剂或生产成生物燃料。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhao, G. et al. A Megacity-Scale Analysis of Sludge Managementand Carbon Footprint in China. Pol. J. Environ. Stud. 31, 2451–2460 (2022).
Zhao, G. et al. A Megacity-Scale Analysis of Sludge Managementand Carbon Footprint in China. Pol. J. Environ. Stud. 31, 2451–2460 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the data set for the vacuum drying process of municipal wastewater treatment sludge, it is important to consider the specific context and scale of the process within the overall treatment facility. It is advised to account for the upstream and downstream impacts associated with the sludge processing, such as the energy consumption of vacuum drying, the emissions from subsequent transportation, and the ultimate disposal or utilization path. Care should be taken to ensure that the data reflects the actual technological capacity and efficiency of the treatment facility. In addition, considerations should be given to any possible changes in regulations or standards affecting sludge management which can impact the environmental performance of the process.
在使用市政污水处理污泥真空干燥过程的数据集时，重要的是要考虑该过程在整个处理设施中的具体上下文和规模。建议考虑与污泥处理相关的上游和下游影响，如真空干燥的能耗、后续运输的排放，以及最终处置或利用路径。应注意确保数据反映了处理设施的实际技术能力和效率。此外，还应考虑影响污泥管理的任何可能的法规或标准变化，这些变化可以影响过程的环境性能。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
